class.name: ImageLoaderAVIF
class.description: [b]NOTE:[/b] To load an AVIF [Image] from a file, simply use [code]load("res://my_image_file.avif")[/code].

method.name: load_avif_from_buffer
method.description: Loads and returns an [Image] from a [PackedByteArray]. The [PackedByteArray] can be created using [method ResourceSaverAVIF.save_avif_to_buffer].
